title: "I FEEL A LITTLE DEJECTED." Francisco Javier Silva-Serrano After A…
body:
"I FEEL A LITTLE DEJECTED."

Francisco Javier Silva-Serrano After A U.S. Immigration Judge On Wednesday Ordered The 21-Year-Old 
Mexican Immigrant To Leave The Country. 
Serrano Was Arrested In January After Making A Temporary Home Of His Former High School In Apple Valley. He 
Had Hoped To Begin Classes Wednesday At Dunwoody College Of Technology.
